title: n00dDoors
description: Open New Realms with Seamless Functionality! Engineer exceptional entryways, swing open the possibilities for dynamic environments and portal yourself through to new worlds in your game designs.
longDescription:
n00dDoors: Advanced Door Mechanics for Dynamic Game Environments


Unlock new dimensions of interactivity in your game environments with n00dDoors. This fully network-replicated door system is designed to integrate seamlessly into any game, providing a rich set of functionalities for door interactions based on a robust and flexible framework.


Key Features


  • Base Door Actor: Inherits a scripted door functionality, making it straightforward to add and customise new features.
  • Interactive Mechanics: Swing, rotate, and slide doors on any axis, with options to open away from characters or remain neutral, catering to diverse game scenarios.
  • Automatic Widgets: Generates an interact widget upon player overlap, which can be disabled as needed for simpler implementations.
  • Sound Customization: Easily define and implement door-related sounds, enhancing the realism and ambiance of your game.
  • Advanced Locking System: Includes a generic locking mechanism with key support. Manage locks and player authorizations directly through intuitive nodes.
  • Network Optimised: Utilises RepNotify for syncing door positions reliably across the network, ensuring smooth and consistent player experiences.


Flexible and User-Friendly

n00dDoors comes with a base actor ready to be inherited and customised, allowing developers to rapidly deploy new door types with minimal coding required. Whether implementing a high-security facility or a simple cottage, n00dDoors provides the tools needed to enhance your environments dynamically. Inspired by the robust mechanics seen in survival games like Rust, this asset brings a tested level of interactivity and security to your game’s architecture.


Integrated with n00dWorkshop Suite

As part of the n00dWorkshop suite, n00dDoors benefits from consistent updates and compatibility with other n00d assets, streamlining your development process and boosting your game’s technical robustness.


Enhance your game’s environments with n00dDoors, where every entryway opens up endless possibilities.
